DESCRIPTION: When this card is played or #yExhausted, advance the #yStellar #yPhase and change the #yStellar #yAlignment.
The #yStellar #yPhase starts at #b1, and increases whenever a #yStar is played or #yExhausted.
The #yStellar #yAlignment can be either #ySolar or #yLunar. NL #yStellar #yAlignment switches whenever a #yStar is played or #yExhausted.
#yStarlit creatures lose HP equal to the current #yStellar #yPhase at the start of their turn. Each turn, Starlit is reduced by #b1.
